item.title: Hemingway special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 30 ml grapefruit juice
  • 15 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Paloma
item.description:
Note: you can make the drink fancy by substituting the grapefruit soda for grapefruit juice, agave syrup, and soda water.

Ingredients

  • 60 ml tequila
  • 120 ml grapefruit soda
  • 5 ml lime juice
  • pinch of salt
  • (garnish) lime wedge

Instructions

Mix together in a highball glass over ice. Garnish.
